original_title: 最初は他人のそら似　そう思っていたけど、僕のカノジョはAV女優かもしれないー 一日中デートしたあと、嫉妬と優越感渦巻く中でめちゃくちゃ中出ししまくった。
overview: When I was opening a porn site, I found a girl who looked just like her. Her child's name is Aoi Kururugi. I felt strange. In order to find out the truth about her, she asked her out on a drive date. She tries to get 'her secret' out of her mouth, but she dodges it... I want to know more and more about her.
title: Looking Like Someone Else At First. This AV Actress Looks Kind Of Like My Girlfriend... An All-day Date Turns To Jealousy And A Whirlwind Of Overconfidence That Ends In A Serious Creampie Load. Aoi Kururgi - Aoi Kururugi
